name: tinyhyphenator
short_description:
Use this class to achieve efficient and mostly exact word hyphenations. Currently the only language supported is German, but it can very easily be adapted to support other languages. This library spans ~370 lines of C++ code. At the moment there is no real documentation, pleas refer to the comments in the code, they should be quite helpful. A sample is also included. This library is not based on any algorithm published on the internet or elsewhere and it works without a dictionary. The Library is written in C++ and is tested under GCC 4.7, 4.8 and 4.9

[Use it in any way you want, including commercial work, but please include my name and a link to this page]
summary: C++ Library to hyphenate a text
